name: The Toughest! The Invincible! The Unbeatable!
description: Target 1 "Blue-Eyes" monster you control; this turn, that face-up monster is unaffected by card effects, except its own, it cannot be destroyed by battle, also destroy any monster that battles it at the end of the Damage Step. If you Normal or Special Summon "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" while this card is in your GY: You can Set this card to your field, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use this effect of "The Toughest! The Invincible! The Unbeatable!" once per turn.
